price: 106 Et implore le pardon d’Allah qui, en vérité, est Très Clément et Très Miséricordieux.
arabic: وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرِ ٱللَّهَۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-is'taghfiri al-laha inna al-laha kāna ghafūran raḥīman
